Text: ok, this does have multiplayer, but I cant get it to work, i open SAMP/internet tab/I click The Server & put my player name/right click the server and click "connect", it all goes well but then just starts the games as single player, I looked up the problem online and it was very clear that the problem was that this version is not compatible with SAMP, and needed a downgrade patch, so i got a downgrade patch but then said that this version of GTA is not compatible with the patch, did anyone else have this problem? if so please help me, besides that I liked the torrent very much thank you.
